title: [Gameplay] Riot Blitzcrank skin sound effect on E gone
body:
Easy to replicate (probably easier if we had a sandbox mode -.-) go into game with Riot Blitzcrank skin get to level 2 because everyone starts Q. Press E and have sound on.

No siren. 

Where is my SIREN?

OH GOD THE SILENCE!

HOTFIX 

p.s. I will abstain from league until this is remedied as I need my invisible god hand sound.

replies.body:
Hiya Adam D Smith! 

Thanks for the report! We'll investigate the issue and get this working again! :]

Thanks Kate, much appreciated!

I should point out that it isn't just the sound that is missing from his E the Sirens on his shoulders don't light up either so that would be under Visual effects for his E as well.
Thanks for getting this resolved so quickly!

Sorry to bother you on an unrelated thread, but I would like to tell you that MF's unique auto sound for her Mafia skin isn't working either, and hasn't since her VU. (I'm not sure if this was intentional or not, so I just wanted to ask and be sure.)

yes i want my siren back
MAKE RIOT NOTICE

Oh since you are here and this blitzcrank bug is fairly major let me point out a few others. 

When you pull a champion across a wall with no space between blitzcrank and the wall the enemy champ pulled stops on the other side of the wall; this started with the new map on SR.

Also other times when you hit a hook after Tristana lands from a rocket jump it considers her taking off not landing so it breaks the hook.

Sometimes the shield from mana barrier when not completely used up but partially used will remain on blitzcrank visually (on the healthbar). 

That is all the bugs I as a blitzcrank main can think of right now.

I think he also needs a QoL fix on his Ult passive so that it doesn't aggro neutral monsters in the jungle and drag/baron when they are not already aggro'd. I shouldn't have to use up my ult so I can safely check baron/dragon pit for wards. I also dislike aggro'n every jungle camp I decide to walk past.

If you really wanted to perfect the ult passive on blitzcrank; make it so it doesn't activate on lane minions when blitzcrank is in a bush so that he can safely hide instead of it giving away his position as has happened to me...

Basically his ult passive is more trouble than it is worth but not really cause the damage is kinda insane...

i have the same problem, i want the WIJU WIJU SOUND! ITS SO AWESOME <3
Edit: also, its making imposible {{champion:53}} hook the {{champion:81}} , becouse he can always dodge it with his E even if {{champion:81}}  is hooked, its like with the {{champion:18}}  thing.

IncredibIe that is working as intended; but trist should only break the hook at the starting half of her jump imo.

To hook a ez you need to first silence him with your Ult Active then pull as the silence will stop him from using E. You can also just W up to Ez and E him, he will E away then u pull him back in.
Thank man. :) I appreciate your help. {{champion:53}}
